name: Mazzle (Simblend)
description:
Mazzle is a maze puzzle game easy to play and have fun.

Mazzle contains 70+ unique and colorful levels for you to enjoy.

Levels are completed once you collect all diamonds and reach finish in the fastest time, the faster you complete level the more stars you will get for each level.

Mazzle has features as:

1. Teleport

2. Bomb

3. Cracked wall

4. Bridge

5. Electricity

6. Spikes

7. Cracked floor

8. Fire

9. Water

10. 45 degree levels

+ upcoming features.

Mazzle is free to play for everyone however we show ads to support the future development of this and other games made by Simblend.

In Mazzle you can purchase things as :

1.30% more time to complete levels

2.Infinity time to complete levels

3.Skips - to skip harder levels

4.Remove Ads

Mazzle does not need internet connection to be played.
